document.full_text: perry jones will miss the first five games next season if he stays at baylor after an n.c.a.a. reinstatement committee upheld an earlier ruling that declared him ineligible.
document.title: sports briefing | college basketball: baylor's jones suspended for five games next season
lines_and_colors: perry jones will miss the first five games next season if he stays at baylor after an n.c.a.a. reinstatement committee upheld an earlier ruling that declared him ineligible.
